fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Education and training, Business and Industry, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
techUK has an interest in the activities in three European institutions – commission, parliament and council – and their impact on their UK technology industry and digital economy. 
 
Interests include: 
Digital Single Market Strategy 
EU Communications Regulatory Framework 
Cybercrime 
Data Retention 
Data Protection 
Internet of Things 
Content Online 
Copyright 
Safer Internet 
Network Security & Interoperability  
EGovernment and eHealth
organisation_name: Information Technology Telecommunications and Electronics Association (techUK)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
- information sharing and dialogue on legislative developments affecting the UK technology sector and digital economy 
- publication on Digital Single Market 
- involvement in European Commission projects 
- publication of techUK submissions to European Commission consultations on Digital Single Market initiatives
goals__remit:
techUK represents the companies and technologies that are defining today the world that we will live in tomorrow 
 
More than 850 companies are members of techUK. Collectively they employ more than 500,000 people, about half of all tech sector jobs in the UK. These companies range from leading FTSE 100 companies to new innovative start-ups. The majority of our members are small and medium sized businesses. 
 
techUK is committed to helping its members and the sector grow.
